A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"The Force is indeed strong with The Last Jedi as it intrepidly ventures outside the traditional Star Wars story structure while maintaining the essential identity of Star Wars. I laughed. I cried. I was genuinely surprised. I have no idea how J.J. Abrams is going to follow up this masterpiece.\"\nFull review: http://filmassessment.blogspot.com/2017/12/star-wars-last-jedi-review.html
